channel.title: Augmented-by-AI on tedn.life
channel.description: Recent content in Augmented-by-AI on tedn.life

item.title: The Augmented Software Engineer - What is it?
item.description:
I can hear you loud and clear …

Ooohhh my god: Not another blog post about AI!!!

Bear with me. I will try to make reading it (or watching it) worth while your time. I promise.


Let’s set the stage. My opinion is …

The planet has problems (over-population, climate-change, poverty and economic inequality, cancer and alzheimer, …). AI is coming. And I believe AI can help us to solve some of these problems or make them more managable (e.g. AlphaFold).

item.title: Augmented Blogging - The Art of Prompting
item.description:
This is a landmark blog post. I just introduced a tag called Augmented-by-AI. And this post is tagged with it.

This is going to be the new normal. Let me explain …

First things first: This blog post is not written by chatGPT.

It is Sunday morning, 6am and I am sitting here in my living room in my PJ with a cup of coffee and I am typing this. Believe me …

item.title: The pillars of a sustainable energy future - A fireside chat
item.description:
This blog post is interesting in more than one way, because …

  • I am going to discuss a topic that is deer to my heart: What do we need to do to get to a better place with respect to a sustainable energy future?
  • And I am going to use a new approach: Where I am first going to articulate my thoughts and then I am going to complement it with a fireside chat that I had with chatGPT about the topics at hand.

Here we go …
